name: Infinitely up
description:
Description

Infinitely up - this is an physical entertaining puzzle in which you need to build a tower of blocks that are randomly given to you. You lose if any of the blocks do not remain on the tower and fall. Collect points, get to higher levels, be smart in building. The game has several modes, both fairly easy and more difficult. There are also different figures that will help you as well as interfere with the construction. Can you build the highest tower?

Features:

- Interesting and simple gameplay

- Different modes

-Different figures

- Game with physics

- Pleasant music

- Minimalistic picture
